# 3D Employee Task Tracker - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a 3D Employee Task Tracker web application built with React, Vite, React Three Fiber, and TailwindCSS.

## Tech Stack
- React + Vite
- React Three Fiber (@react-three/fiber) 
- Drei (@react-three/drei)
- Three.js
- Zustand (state management)
- TailwindCSS

## Features
- 3D floating employee cards in a 3D scene
- Interactive task sticky notes
- Camera animations and smooth transitions
- UI overlay with dashboard, filters, and modals
- Responsive design with modern UI

## Development Guidelines
- Use component-based architecture
- Implement proper state management with Zustand
- Follow React Three Fiber best practices
- Use TailwindCSS for styling overlay components
- Maintain clean, readable code structure

## Project Setup Complete
✅ All components created and configured
✅ Dependencies installed
✅ Build system working
✅ Development server running on http://localhost:3000

## Available Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
